700160f-a.title: Bronx: 157th Street (East) - River Avenue
700160f-a.text:
East 157th Street (foreground), at the N.W. corner of River Ave.,
showing construction work in progress on part of the Yankee Stadium,
American League baseball park. On the right is the elevated structure
of the I.R.T. Jereome Ave. subway line, on River Ave.
April 30, 1937.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.

700176f-c.title: Bronx: River Avenue - 157th Street
700176f-c.text:
The Yankee Stadium, at River Ave. and 157th Street, Bronx,
is the scene of various athletic contests. The foot-ball game
shown here has attracted a capacity crowd. These three views
show the field, the stands and several celebrities.
About 1936
Views 1,2 and 3
MAY BE REPRODUCED.
View 1. Mig S59
View S Neg a N030
